title: Does He Still Have Feelings For Her
itunes:title: Does He Still Have Feelings For Her
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my husband and I have been together for almost 20 years. When we first started dating there was a female “friend” that was in his circle of friends. I didn’t think anything of it for a while but there were red flags that kept popping up and there was a certain vibe that I kept picking up on whenever they were in the same space...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
